select si_idx, target_name, target_cat_name, target_cost_value, loccode, l.locname, si_title, mobile_url, pc_url, si_end_dt, si_cret_dt, si_active_yn, view_cnt, share_cnt, save_cnt, mb_save_yn, (si.view_cnt + si.share_cnt + si.save_cnt) as totalCnt from itda_app.support_info si left join itda_app.my_bookmark mb on si.si_idx = mb.mb_addidx and mb.mb_idx = ( select mb_idx from itda_app.my_bookmark where 1=1
and mb_cret_id = #{user_id}
and mb_addidx = si.si_idx order by mb_cret_dt desc limit 1 ) left join (select loccode, locname from itda_app.loccode) as l on l.loccode = si.loc_code left join (select tl_type_cd from itda_app.time_line tl where tl.tl_page_type = '지원사업'
and tl.tl_cret_id = #{user_id}
group by tl_type_cd) as info on tl_type_cd = si.si_idx where 1=1 and si.si_active_yn = 'Y'
and si_title like concat('%', ${search_text}, '%') or target_name like concat('%', ${search_text}, '%') or locname like concat('%', ${search_text}, '%')
order by
totalCnt desc
target_cost_value desc
si_end_dt desc
1=1
